<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// StackSlot scavenging is only implemented for the default stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ad718aae0ce2a188fa35cb2781024ffc0">getStackID</a>(i) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/targetstackid/#a71392100eb15ba746b1f898986f5d8a5af2af9eb94ff1bc08308bc738d744ee85">TargetStackID::Default</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add callee-save objects if there are any.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ObjStart, ObjEnd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StackGrowsDown) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ObjOffset is negative when StackGrowsDown is true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ObjStart = -ObjOffset - ObjSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ObjEnd = -ObjOffset;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore fixed holes that are in the previous stack frame.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(ObjStart, ObjAlign) != ObjStart)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Byte = 0; Byte &lt; ObjSize; ++Byte)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop over all of the stack objects, assigning sequential addresses...</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start at the beginning of the local area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Offset is the distance from the stack top in the direction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of stack growth -- so it&#39;s always nonnegative.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LocalAreaOffset &gt;= 0</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are fixed sized objects that are preallocated in the local area,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-fixed objects can&#39;t be allocated right at the start of local area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust &#39;Offset&#39; to point to the end of last fixed sized preallocated</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t FixedOff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StackGrowsDown) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The maximum distance from the stack pointer is at lower address of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the object -- which is given by offset. For down growing stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the offset is negative, so we negate the offset to get the distance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FixedOff = -MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The maximum distance from the start pointer is at the upper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address of the object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FixedOff = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(i) + MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a9284fd53296d2a2f8ae654d000971000">getObjectSize</a>(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FixedOff &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = FixedOff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxCSFrameIndex &gt;= MinCSFrameIndex) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt;= MaxCSFrameIndex - MinCSFrameIndex; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FixedCSEnd is the stack offset to the end of the fixed and callee-save</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t FixedCSEnd = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure the special register scavenging spill slot is closest to the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1539"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1540"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some instructions (e.g. inline asm instructions) can have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1541"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple frame indices and/or cause eliminateFrameIndex</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1542"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to insert more than one instruction. We need the register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scavenger to go through all of these instructions so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it can update its register information. We keep the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1545"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iterator at the point before insertion so that we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1546"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// revisit them in full.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1547"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AtBeginning = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab2d91e7bec944efcbc39d8e30644f111">begin</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AtBeginning) --<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this instruction has a FrameIndex operand, we need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use that target machine register info object to eliminate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>.eliminateFrameIndex(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, SPAdj, i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reset the iterator if we were at the beginning of the BB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AtBeginning) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DoIncr = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DidFinishLoop = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are looking at a call sequence, we need to keep track of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the SP adjustment made by each instruction in the sequence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This includes both the frame setup/destroy pseudos (handled above),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as well as other instructions that have side effects w.r.t the SP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that this must come after eliminateFrameIndex, because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if I itself referred to a frame index, we shouldn&#39;t count its own</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adjustment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DidFinishLoop &amp;&amp; InsideCallSequence)</span></CodeLine>
